# NSPrivacyTracking

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether your app or third-party SDK uses data for tracking.

## Overview

Set the value for this key to `true` if your app or third-party SDK uses data for tracking as defined under the App Tracking Transparency framework. When set to `true` you need to provide a list of internet domains in [doc://com.apple.bundleresources/documentation/BundleResources/App-Privacy-Configuration/NSPrivacyTrackingDomains]. For more information, see [https://developer.apple.com/app-store/user-privacy-and-data-use/].

## Declaring tracking

- **NSPrivacyTrackingDomains**: A list of the internet domains your app or third-party SDK uses for tracking.
